content: each of the first 10 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 60 round 7-11 1 double_crochet in each stitch around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 60 switch to g hook round 12 half_double_crochet around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 60 round 13 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 60 round 14 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 60 round 15 single_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet 60 fasten_off turn the hat inside out and weave in ends leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner ©2020 this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced edited or modified in any way or manner and claimed as your own all photos are copyrighted and the sole property of leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner and may not be shared or used you may sell your finished products at stores craft shows and online but if you sell online please credit me 5 child height should be 7 5-7 75 with h hook round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 11 double_crochet in the magic_ring pull tight join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 11 round 2 2 double_crochet in the same stitch as join and in each stitch around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 22 round 3 1 double_crochet in the same stitch as join *2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 double_crochet in next stitch* repeat from *around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 33 round 4 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 2 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 44 round 5 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 55 round 6 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 6 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around you will not end on 2 double_crochet join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 62 round 7-12 1 double_crochet in each stitch around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 62 switch to g hook round 13 half_double_crochet around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 62 round 14 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 62 round 15 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 62 round 16 single_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet 62 fasten_off turn the hat inside out and weave in ends leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner ©2020 this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced
